item.title: RBAC in Kubernetes
item.description: How to give a pod the access to run kubectl to create pods or configmaps? It's very simple. Every pods has to bind to a service account, it will be default, if you haven't specify one. And by default, this account didn't have any access to the kubernetes API. First, create a service account.
